excerpt: Sourdough pizzas & craft beer in an industrial-chic space with stone arches, wood beams & a garden.
detail_description: Framento is a pizzeria and craft beer spot located in an industrial-chic space with stone arches, wood beams, and a garden. It was established in 2015 by chef Pierluigi Fais and is known for its contemporary approach to pizza. The restaurant is set to move to a five-story building with a terrace, where the concept will expand beyond just pizza.
name: Framento
address: Corso Vittorio Emanuele II, 94, 09123 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Refined Sardinian tasting menus & wine pairings in an elegant, understated space with framed art.
detail_description: Dal Corsaro is an Italian restaurant in Cagliari which has been awarded a Michelin star. Dishes embracing seasonality and simplicity have won the restaurant its accolade, with seven, nine and eleven-course menus available. The kitchen is run by young Stefano Deidda, who has a mastery of transforming traditional Sardinian ingredients into delicately refined dishes that never disappoint.
name: Ristorante Dal Corsaro
address: V.le Regina Margherita, 28, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: "Il Rifugio" is a charming family-owned restaurant with a cozy atmosphere, featuring rustic decor and a wood-burning stove. The menu offers fresh local meats and cheeses, homemade pasta, and delectable desserts like semifreddo ice cream drizzled with honey. Chef Francesco Nanu curates the menu, which includes unique dishes such as culurgiones stuffed with almonds, orange zest, and guanciale.
name: "Il Rifugio"
address: Via Antonio Mereu, 28, 08100 Nuoro NU, Italy

detail_description: Nestled along the stunning seafront of Alghero, Les Arenes is a beloved local gem that promises an unforgettable dining experience. With its inviting terrace shaded by umbrellas, guests can savor breathtaking seaside views while indulging in delicious wood-fired pizzas and regional specialties. The menu features standout dishes like the unique Sardinia-style seafood paella made with fregola and the mouthwatering porceddu al forno, or suckling pig.
name: Les Arenes
address: Via Lido, 73, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

excerpt: Sardinian pasta, fish & seafood classics served in a relaxed setup decorated with photographs.
detail_description: Stella Marina Di Montecristo is a renowned restaurant in Cagliari, Sardinia, offering an authentic and delightful seafood dining experience. Despite being Michelin-starred, it provides classic Sardinian dishes without the hefty price tag. The fixed lunch menu offers three courses of delectable seafood options. For a refreshing waterside drink, visitors can head to Emerson or La Paillote, both owned by former Cagliari star Francois Modesto.
name: Stella Marina Di Montecristo
address: Via Sardegna, 140, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Artfully presented seafood, pasta & fish, plus Sardinian wines, on a leafy terrace with gulf views.
detail_description: "I Frati Rossi" is a charming restaurant located in Porto Cervo, offering a serene escape from the bustling coastal scene. The restaurant boasts a leafy terrace with stunning views of the gulf, providing an ideal setting to enjoy Sardinian cuisine and local wines. The menu features artfully presented seafood, pasta, and fish dishes, complemented by Sardinian wines.
name: I Frati Rossi
address: Porto Cervo - Costa Smeralda SS IT, Via Paolino Azara, 07021 Pantogia, Italy

excerpt: Modest rooms in a warm B&B featuring a regional eatery with a fireplace, plus a garden.
detail_description: Nestled in the charming seaside village of Santa Lucia, Locanda Tipica Sa Corte is a delightful B&B that captures the essence of Sardinian hospitality. With its modest yet cozy rooms and a welcoming atmosphere, this establishment features a regional eatery complete with a fireplace and an inviting garden. The surrounding area boasts two stunning beaches and lush pine forests, making it perfect for nature lovers.
name: Locanda Tipica Sa Corte
address: Via Nuoro, 138, 08025 Oliena NU, Italy

detail_description: Quintilio, situated south of Alghero, offers a limited selection between meat and fish. However, this lack of variety does not diminish its high recommendation for visitors in the area. This bustling bar/restaurant can accommodate around 120 people and is particularly popular among locals. The restaurant takes pride in sourcing locally and preparing their dishes fresh, often utilizing a barbecue to cook the meat and fish that change daily based on availability at the nearby market.
name: Quintilio
address: Via S. Josemaría Escrivá de Balaguer, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Luigi Pomata, located on Viale Regina Margherita in Cagliari, Italy, is known for its interpretation of tuna caught by the fleet of the island of San Pietro. The restaurant is considered one of the great dining options in the city. Over the past decade, Cagliari has emerged as a gourmet destination with a changing culinary landscape. Notable openings like Cucina.
name: Luigi Pomata
address: V.le Regina Margherita, 18, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Sabores, formerly known as Sapori di Sardegna, is a charming spot located in Cagliari. The store offers a delightful selection of raw milk cheeses, local cured meats, and natural wines. Additionally, there's a kitchen corner where simple yet well-prepared dishes are crafted daily. Visitors can enjoy the ambiance by grabbing a table outside and indulging in the recommended wine while people-watching. The establishment is highly praised for its fantastic food, natural wine offerings, and exceptional service.
name: Sabores
address: Via Lodovico Baylle, 6, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

excerpt: Typical Sardinian dishes rustled up in a brick-&-stone space with quaint alley tables.
detail_description: Su Cumbidu is a restaurant in Cagliari, Italy that offers typical Sardinian dishes in a charming brick-and-stone setting with quaint alley tables. The restaurant is known for its authentic selection of Sardinian cuisine, including dishes like culurgiones, malloreddus alla campidanese, and fregula with artichokes or porcini mushrooms.
name: Su Cumbidu
address: Via Napoli, 13, 09124 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Porto Cervo, ConFusion is a contemporary dining gem that promises an unforgettable culinary experience. Under the expert guidance of Chef Antonio Serra and Chef Italo Bassi, this Michelin-starred restaurant artfully blends traditional Sardinian ingredients with innovative cooking techniques. Guests can indulge in a diverse menu featuring everything from exquisite seafood crudo to unique dishes like deer tartare and sea-urchin gelato.
name: Confusion
address: Promenade du port Via Aga Khan 1, Via Porto Vecchio, 1, 07021 Porto Cervo SS, Italy

detail_description: Trattoria Locanda il Genovese 2.0 is a delightful guest house nestled in La Maddalena, just a short distance from the picturesque Punta Nera and Punta Tegge Beaches. This charming B&B offers cozy accommodations with lovely inner courtyard views and balconies, making it an ideal spot for relaxation after exploring the island's breathtaking coastline. Guests have praised the friendly service and delicious food, particularly highlighting their pasta with pesto, excellent focaccia, and flavorful lasagna.
name: Trattoria locanda il Genovese 2.0
address: Via Manfredo Fanti, 10, 07024 La Maddalena SS, Italy

excerpt: Pasta, pizza & seafood dishes at an airy seaside venue with a covered beachfront terrace.
detail_description: Nestled along the stunning coastline of Stintino, Il Gabbiano is a delightful seaside restaurant that offers an inviting atmosphere with its airy design and covered beachfront terrace. Guests can indulge in a delectable array of seafood dishes, pasta, and pizza while enjoying breathtaking views just steps from the sea. The location is perfect for families, as children can play on the beach while adults savor expertly prepared traditional cuisine in this picturesque setting.
name: Il Gabbiano - Stintino
address: Viale la Pelosa, 32, 07040 Stintino SS, Italy

detail_description: Abbamele Osteria is a renowned restaurant located in Barbagia, Sardinia, known for its modern reinterpretation of traditional Sardinian recipes. Chef Mauro Ladu skillfully reinvents ancient dishes, incorporating contemporary elements while preserving the essence of the original cuisine. The restaurant offers a culinary journey featuring well-prepared meats, excellent local wines, and a perfect fusion of old and new flavors.
name: Abbamele Osteria
address: Corso V. Emanuele III', 59, 08024 Mamoiada NU, Italy

excerpt: Romantic sunset views from the terrace of a stylish seaside restaurant known for meat & shellfish.
detail_description: Ristorante The Kings is a stylish seaside restaurant in Alghero, Sardinia, offering romantic sunset views from its terrace. It is renowned for its focus on fish and seafood, using only the freshest ingredients to create dishes such as tuna, mussels, and red mullet soup. The restaurant's location on the Alghero bastions allows diners to enjoy beautiful sunsets while dining.
name: Ristorante The Kings
address: Bastioni Marco Polo, 5, 07041 Alghero SS, Italy

detail_description: Nestled on the charming island of Sant'Antioco in southwestern Sardinia, Da Achille is a culinary treasure that promises an unforgettable dining experience. Named after its talented chef, Achille Pinna, this restaurant beautifully marries traditional Sardinian flavors with modern twists inspired by Thai and Japanese cuisine. Guests are welcomed into a warm and inviting atmosphere where attentive service enhances the overall experience.
name: Da Achille
address: Via Nazionale, 80, 09017 Sant'Antioco SU, Italy

detail_description: Locanda Da Renzo, situated in Siamaggiore just outside Oristano on the west of Sardinia, offers a delightful culinary experience that combines fresh seafood with local pasta. The menu reflects the vibrant flavors of the coast and pays homage to Sardinia's cooking traditions. The location is stylish and perfect for special events. Guests can enjoy spacious and comfortable rooms within an olive tree orchard, complete with a lovely swimming pool and a top-quality floodlit tennis court.
name: Locanda Da Renzo
address: Loc. Sa Turritta, 09070 Siamaggiore OR, Italy

excerpt: The largest covered food market in Italy, with separate departments for produce, fish & more.
detail_description: The Civic Market of San Benedetto is a bustling and vibrant covered food market located in Cagliari, Italy. It is renowned as the largest covered market in Italy and Europe, spanning two stories and 8,000 square meters. The market features separate departments for produce, fish, meat, and more.
name: Civic Market of San Benedetto
address: Via Francesco Cocco Ortu, 46, 09128 Cagliari CA, Italy

detail_description: Sa Cardiga e su Schironi is a renowned restaurant located just outside Cagliari, in Maddalena Spiaggia. It's considered one of the best dining establishments in the area and is popular among both locals and tourists. The restaurant prides itself on using fresh, high-quality local ingredients to create delicious dishes with impeccable presentation.
name: Sa Cardiga e su Schironi
address: località Maddalena Spiaggia, 09012 La Maddalena CA, Italy
